cause.description:
The Rising Farmworker Dream Fund (RFDF) is a venture philanthropy firm that aims to transform the lives of farm workers using the power and resources of business. RFDF’s first initiative is the Migrant MBA Project which seeks to promote graduate business degrees among sons and daughters of migrant and seasonal farm workers.
1. Helping Yourself
2. Helping Others Help Themselves
3. Using business and capitalism for positive change
cause.mission: Help U.S. farm laborers and the sons and daughters of farm laborers leverage the power and resources of business to help themselves and others
cause.name: Rising Farmworker Dream Fund
